name: Handrawn ENDLESS Game
description:
This is a procedurally generated game, which means that it creates itself, so it is never-ending. The art made for the game is hand drawn.

I just told you everything that the title says :P

Controls

- Left mouse button or spacebar to change direction

- Press R to reset

Oh and one more thing! If you have an idea for a game that you would like to make, but do not know how to make games. Then I can help you!

Click here to see my Fiverr gig
